subject: Economy
question_en: Which of the following is not a component of Keynesian economics?
question_hi: केन्यानियन प्रौद्योगिक कार्यक्रम के अनुसार निमित्त मूल्यवाहन भी नहीं है।
explanation_en: Keynesian economics is a branch of classical economics that focuses on government intervention in the economy. In contrast, laissez-faire economy is a theoretical concept that advocates for minimal government intervention. Therefore, laissez-faire economics is not a component of Keynesian economics.
explanation_hi: केनियन प्रौद्योगिक एक साधारण प्रौद्योगिक विश्वामिति है, जो सरकार के उपयोग को देखाने के लिएगे, जिनियाँ एक विश्वामिति है, जो सरकार देखाने के लिएगे।
explanation_en: Keynesian economics is a branch of macroeconomics that focuses on government intervention in the economy. In contrast, laissez-faire economics advocates for minimal government intervention. Therefore, laissez-faire economics is not a component of Keynesian economics.
explanation_hi: केनियाँ एक विश्वामिति है, जो सरकार के उपयोग को देखाने के लिएगे।
explanation_en: Keynesian economics is a branch of macroeconomics that focuses on government intervention in the economy. In contrast, laissez-faire economics advocates for minimal government intervention. Therefore, laissez-faire economics is not a component of Keynesian economics.
explanation_hi: केनियाँ एक मूल विश्वामिति है, जो सरकार को उपयोग को देखाने के लिएगे।
explanation_en: Keynesian economics is a branch of macroeconomics that focuses on government intervention in the economy. In contrast, laissez-faire economics advocates for minimal government intervention. Therefore, laissez-faire economics is not a component of Keynesian economics.
explanation_hi: केनियाँ एक मूल विश्वामिति है, जो सरकार को उपयोग को देखाने के लिएगे।
explanation_en: Keynesian economics is a branch of macroeconomics that focuses on government intervention in the economy. In contrast, laissez-faire economics advocates for minimal government intervention. Therefore, laissez-faire economics is not a component of Keynesian economics.
